Basic Starter.description: A basic starter template for a custom Alexa skill.

API Starter.description: A basic starter template for an Alexa skill that calls an external API.

Attributes Starter.description: A basic starter template for an Alexa skill that shows how to store attributes in DynamoDB using the ASK SDK 2.0.

VideoApp Starter.description: A starter template for an Alexa skill that uses the VideoApp Interface.

Audio Stream Starter.description: A starter template for an Alexa audio streaming skill.

Customer Profile API Starter.description: A starter template for Alexa skill that uses the Customer Profile API

Device Location API Starter.description: A starter template for Alexa skill that uses the Device Location API

Customer Settings API Starter.description: A simple template to demonstrate Customer Settings API

Progressive Response Starter Alexa.description: A template that provides a simple example of a skill that gives progressive response

DynamoDB Starter Alexa.description: A template that demonstrates how to use DynamoDB to manage user data in an Alexa skill.

Can Fulfill Intent Starter.description: A simple template to demonstrate CanFulfillIntentRequest

Dialog Delegate Starter Alexa.description: An Alexa skill template that provides a simple example of a skill that utilizes the Dialog Delegate Feature.

Presentation Language Starter.description: An Alexa skill template that shows how to use the Alexa Presentation Language.

In Skill Purchase Starter.description: An Alexa skill template that shows how to use In Skill Purchases for your Alexa Skills.

Proactive Event API Starter.description: An Alexa skill template that shows how to integrate Proactive Events API.
